item.name: Redis $3
item.description: Number of clients pending on a blocking call (BLPOP, BRPOP, BRPOPLPUSH)

item.name: Redis $3
item.description: System CPU consumed by the Redis server

item.name: Redis $3
item.description: The network's read rate per second in KB/sec

item.name: Redis $3
item.description: Number of commands processed per second

item.name: Redis $3
item.description: The network's write rate per second in KB/sec

item.name: Redis $3
item.description: Number of successful lookup of keys in the main dictionary

item.name: Redis $3
item.description: Number of failed lookup of keys in the main dictionary

item.name: Redis $3
item.description: The value of the maxmemory configuration directive

item.name: Redis $3
item.description: The value of the maxmemory-policy configuration directive

item.name: Redis $3
item.description: Ratio between used_memory_rss and used_memory

item.name: Redis $3
item.description: Operating system hosting the Redis server

item.name: Redis $3
item.description: The server's mode ("standalone", "sentinel" or "cluster")

item.name: Redis $3
item.description: Version of the Redis server

item.name: Redis $3
item.description: 由于maxclients限制而被拒绝的连接数

item.name: Redis $3
item.description: TCP/IP listen port

item.name: Redis $3
item.description: Total number of commands processed by the server

item.name: Redis $3
item.description: Total number of connections accepted by the server

item.name: Redis $3
item.description: Same value expressed in days

item.name: Redis $3
item.description: Number of seconds since Redis server start

item.name: Redis $3
item.description: System CPU consumed by the Redis server

item.name: Redis $3
item.description: System CPU consumed by the background processes

item.name: Redis $3
item.description: User CPU consumed by the Redis server

item.name: Redis $3
item.description: User CPU consumed by the background processes

item.name: Redis $3
item.description: Total number of bytes allocated by Redis using its allocator

item.name: Redis $3
item.description: Number of bytes used by the Lua engine

item.name: Redis $3
item.description: Peak memory consumed by Redis (in bytes)

item.name: Redis $3
item.description: Number of bytes that Redis allocated as seen by the operating system (a.k.a resident set size). This is the number reported by tools such as top(1) and ps(1)
